item.title: Truth of Fact, The Truth of Feeling by Ted Chiang
item.description: The Truth of Fact, the Truth of Feeling by Ted Chiang — Subterranean Press When my daughter Nicole was an infant, I read an essay suggesting that it might no longer be necessary to teach children how to read or write, because speech recognition and synthesis would soon render those abilities superfluous. My wife and I were horrified by the idea, and we resolved that, no matter how sophisticated technology became, our daughter’s skills would always rest on the bedrock of traditional literacy.
